results.content: While I've taken basic courses before, Brent's explanations and demos are very clear and precise.  I appreciate the detail immensely.
results.content_html: While I've taken basic courses before, Brent's explanations and demos are very clear and precise. I appreciate the detail immensely.

results.content: Engaging voice. Understandable material. Easy to move around in the course material. Works well on iPad.
results.content_html: Engaging voice. Understandable material. Easy to move around in the course material. Works well on iPad.

results.content: Was trying out 2d animation for a bit but something was missing. I didn't understand the basics of how to draw a circle or any shape efficiently. Nor do I understand perspective which is important. After doing Brent's courses, my approach to drawing and mapping has become much easier. I'd absolutely recommend these courses to those looking to draw, either as a hobby or as a start to a career that uses such skills. Whether its animation, design, or architecture. The courses I've learned so far are absolutely useful for all things drawing related!

results.content: The course is great and huge value as part of a larger series of courses but... would be nice to be able to download the reference pictures so that we could practice on our own.
results.content_html: The course is great and huge value as part of a larger series of courses but... would be nice to be able to download the reference pictures so that we could practice on our own.

results.content: It feels very thorough to me.  I have taken too many drawing courses that had no structure .
results.content_html: It feels very thorough to me. I have taken too many drawing courses that had no structure .

results.content:
Yes, it's been absolutely amazing!!
I'm 73 years old, and have always wished that I could draw, but have always thought that I didn't have any talent... My work kept me pretty busy, so that attending drawing classes was just not an option for me, and after I retired I hit a number of health issues. But now I've decided to take the bull by the horns, and I am absolutely LOVING these courses!! Thanks so much!!
results.content_html:
Yes, it's been absolutely amazing!!

results.content: A wealth of useful information and critical concepts are presented in this course by Mr. Eviston that will intrigue, challenge, and even dazzle beginners and experienced artists alike! As has been true in the other courses I have taken with him, his style of presentation is slow and methodical. He demonstrates each tool and technique while clearly describing each as he works. He gives many opportunities to practice each, but encourages students to do more and more of the practice sets to deeply embed these basic skills into place. Section 2, Day 3: Beyond the Box was my favorite and most challenging. I thought I understood how boxes in space respond to perspective, but when I started drawing them myself, I often got confused or just lost in the process. A quick rewind of the lesson helped me find my confusion, correct my image, and then move to another. It took me six or seven times of drawing many boxes before I finally understood and could see how to use the techniques to create boxes in space and in perspective. The ending project is fun to do because he has found a way to put all of the skills in this and his earlier courses to work to produce a satisfying final drawing. There are more courses in this series, and I cannot wait to study more with him!  Dave in California

results.content: Love the course and the descriptions and explanations that Brent provides.  He is very interesting, encouraging, and teaches in small steps but still allows for great progress.
results.content_html: Love the course and the descriptions and explanations that Brent provides. He is very interesting, encouraging, and teaches in small steps but still allows for great progress.

results.content: the demo of light lines is too light to learn from
results.content_html: the demo of light lines is too light to learn from

results.content: This was great! Brent is knowledgeable and teaches in a way that presents a complex subject to be understandable to an average viewer. He provides constructive feedback, advice, motivation and sets realistic expectations (which is important when facing setbacks in doing fundamentals like these). The course itself is a mix of theory, drills, and putting all of that on observational drawing. It is definitely helping me a lot in breaking the canonical perspective :)
results.content_html: This was great! Brent is knowledgeable and teaches in a way that presents a complex subject to be understandable to an average viewer. He provides constructive feedback, advice, motivation and sets realistic expectations (which is important when facing setbacks in doing fundamentals like these). The course itself is a mix of theory, drills, and putting all of that on observational drawing. It is definitely helping me a lot in breaking the canonical perspective :)

results.content: I love the sequence of these courses and lectures. They are so well organized that I am facing just the right level of challenge, and I'm happy to see that in under 2 hrs/day I can get through 1 lesson.  Thank you for motivating us to keep going by reiterating the importance of taking time to learn and practice these new skills. I've been tempted to put this aside and do something more expressive/creative, but your affirmations that this technical training is worth is, and the progress I'm seeing in how I look at and draw objects differently are helping me follow through!

results.content: I have already drawn cylinders and boxes, but I did not include the right perspective when drawing them.  View and distance make a huge difference in how believable things look and I am so glad to be learning all of these things.
